scripts.build: npm run build:js && npm run build:css
scripts.build:js: NODE_ENV=production browserify src/index.js -t babelify -t stripify | uglifyjs -mc > public/js/script.js
scripts.dev: npm run watch & browser-sync start --server public --files "public/js/*.js, public/css/*.css" --index index.html --browser "google chrome"
scripts.install-local: npm install babel-preset-es2015 babel-preset-react babelify react react-dom stripify --save-dev
scripts.watch: npm run watch:js & npm run watch:css
